article: Sam's uncle had an old bird which sat in its cage all day. One day his uncle said, "It is too expensive to _ that bird. We will get rid of it." But Sam wanted to _ the bird. Sam's grandfather told him that the bird was once a famous _ bird. Now _ people knew it. His grandfather took the bird out, and then quickly took his arms away. The bird opened its huge _ and flew into the sky. After a few minutes, it _ with a small rabbit, cut it open and started to _ it. The next morning, Sam asked his uncle out. Sam did _ his grandfather had done, but the bird _ to the ground and stood still. Sam's uncle _ . Later his grandfather told him that the bird only hunted in late afternoon when light was less _ . Sam asked his uncle to come out before _ . This time the bird caught a mouse. His uncle was quiet with _ , but laughed again, "We can't eat mice, so this bird is _ ." And he sold the bird without telling Sam. Before Sam found the bird was _ , two angry men arrived in a car. They shouted at his uncle and said, the bird couldn't hunt and they wanted their money back. Sam's uncle looked _ and said, "I have spent it. But... don't worry!" He _ at Sam, "Sam will show you _ to make the bird hunt! It's a great bird, isn't it, Sam?" Sam opened the door of the car and took out the _ . It flew away and disappeared forever.
